name: create-next-app-pwa
description: The script for the npx create-next-app-pwa command. Making it easier for everyone to create a Next.js Progressive Web App.

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_config_global){console.error('Please use npx to run this package instead of installing it.'); process.exit(1)}"

author: Louis Lemsic
